title: Amount
description: An Amount on the Ripple Protocol, used also for XRP in the ripple-rest API

value.description: The quantity of the currency, denoted as a string to retain floating point precision

currency.description: The three-character code or hex string used to denote currencies

counterparty.description: The Ripple account address of the currency's issuer or gateway, or an empty string if the currency is XRP
